TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_nipaluma-odidal, title = nipaluma-odidal, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-odidal} }

S.FORM: == udidal == u siwkay nu nipaluma pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u cudad a ngangan: u sapamat a ngangan: u Amilika a ngangan: u zuma a cidekay a kamu Pangcha: Tayan: Sejek: Paywan: Taluku: Yuwatan: vau sihi tu ismud Rukay: Cou: canapu 'itan Kabalan: Kanakanabu: Laaluwa: Saysia: Puyuma: Saw: Tau: vanilad'cacilad u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika saungay misapayu' a cidekay Yuwatan, Sakizaya, Tau, Cou

== odidal == o siwkay no nipaloma pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o codad a ngangan: o sapamat a ngangan: o Amilika a ngangan: o zoma a cidekay a kamo Pangcha: Tayan: Sejek: Paywan: Taloko: Yowatan: vao sihi to ismod Rokay: Coo: canapo 'itan Kabalan: Kanakanabo: Laalowa: Saysia: Poyoma: Saw: Tao: vanilad'cacilad o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam o solit no Lipon o solit no Amilika saongay misapayo' a cidekay Yowatan, Sakizaya, Tao, Coo
